p: After the experiment, each fish was sacrificed using an overdose of MS-222 solution, fixed in 10% formalin solution, and then stored in 75% ethanol solution. All specimens have been stored appropriately in the fish ecophysiology and evolution laboratory at Florida Institute of Technology for use in current and future teaching and research. All procedures for housing, maintaining and sacrificing experimental fishes strictly followed the guidelines and procedures of the Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC) of the Florida Institute of Technology (IACUC Approval # 101202).
